snippet: Larry Dixon rebounded from a critical mistake near the end of a game against Navy two years ago and has become an invaluable leader for the Black Knights.
abstract: Army fullback Larry Dixon, who is busy preparing with team for upcoming game against Navy, says his devastating fumble two years ago that led to Navy win has helped elevate his game to new heights; has carried 287 times for 1,743 yards and 15 touchdowns since then, and lost only one fumble.
lead_paragraph: Larry Dixon rebounded from a critical mistake near the end of a game against Navy two years ago and has become an invaluable leader for the Black Knights.

headline.seo: Army-Navy Game Is Setting for Larry Dixon to Complete Comeback
headline.main: A Devastating Fumble Torments and Motivates Army’s Quiet Leader
headline.print_headline: A Devastating Fumble Torments and Motivates Army’s Quiet Leader
